query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sample_products (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(100),
  unit VARCHAR(50),
  usl DECIMAL(10,3),
  lsl DECIMAL(10,3),
  target_value DECIMAL(10,3),
  created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

INSERT INTO sample_products (product_code, product_name, category, unit, usl, lsl, target_value) VALUES
('PRD-001', 'Bearing Assembly A', 'Mechanical', 'mm', 25.050, 24.950, 25.000),
('PRD-002', 'Shaft Component B', 'Mechanical', 'mm', 50.100, 49.900, 50.000),
('PRD-003', 'Electronic Module C', 'Electronic', 'V', 5.250, 4.750, 5.000),
('PRD-004', 'Plastic Housing D', 'Plastic', 'mm', 100.200, 99.800, 100.000),
('PRD-005', 'Metal Frame E', 'Metal', 'mm', 200.300, 199.700, 200.000);
